channel.title: documentation on Devops Mantra
channel.description: Recent content in documentation on Devops Mantra

item.title: Getting Started With AWS
item.description: Confused and Puzzeled how and where to get started? No, you are not alone. It is totally natural to get overwhalmed with so many services offered by AWS. Here, i aim to provide just enough information to get started. AWS, or Amazon Web Services does not need any introduction. It is market leader and 80% of cloud workload is on AWS. Sometime, i wonder there should be a guide of simple steps that should guide me just enough to get started with my AWS account.

item.title: Puppet - Getting Started
item.description: Puppet is a responsive, simple and clean Hugo theme based on the Huxblog Jekyll theme.
